channel.title: [Class Suggestion]The FaceStealer
channel.description:
The FaceStealer **Neutral Special** **Passive (Face Rip)** - You use the skill, you become back FaceStealer again. **Passive (Stolen Skills)** - Whenever you steal a face of players, gain that players passive for one night. Eg: inoculate: immune to nightshade and bleeding
**Night Ability (Steal that face)** - You may steal death player's face except for unique roles, or alive player's face. [1 day - cooldown]
Goal: Successful stole 4 player's face and survive!

item.title: [Class Suggestion]The FaceStealer
item.dc:creator: justaneut
item.description:
Its a unique class but it sadly enough could function as a second NK in a game causing mere chaos for bd so prehaps give him some buffs and make him a NK? or just change it so that he doesnt kill but locks them out of there abilities for some time?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion]The FaceStealer

item.description:
The FaceStealer
Neutral Special
Passive (Face Rip) - You use the skill, you become back FaceStealer again.
Passive (Stolen Skills) - Whenever you steal a face of players, gain that players passive for one night. Eg: inoculate: immune to nightshade and bleeding

Night Ability (Steal that face) - You may steal death player’s face except for unique roles, or alive player’s face. [1 day - cooldown]

Goal: Successful stole 4 player’s face and survive!
